text: Ernst Berger (born 15 February 1913, date of death unknown) was a Swiss skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Swiss male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Switzerland Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Ernst Berger
